hero.title: San Francisco Dry Cleaning Alliance
hero.subtitle: 旧金山干洗店联盟
hero.description: Premium dry cleaning services across the Bay Area with professional, convenient, and high-quality laundry care

quality.title: Quality Service
quality.description: All alliance members are carefully vetted to ensure professional and high-quality laundry services

coverage.title: City-Wide Coverage
coverage.description: Located throughout San Francisco neighborhoods, find a member store near you wherever you are

standard.title: Unified Standards
standard.description: Consistent service standards and quality assurance for a reliable dry cleaning experience

dryCleaning.title: Dry Cleaning
dryCleaning.description: Professional dry cleaning for suits, dresses, and fine garments

washing.title: Wash & Press
washing.description: Expert washing and pressing for shirts and casual wear

leather.title: Leather Care
leather.description: Specialized cleaning and care for leather jackets and bags

home.title: Home Textiles
home.description: Cleaning services for curtains, bedding, and carpets

sponsor.title: Featured Sponsors
sponsor.subtitle: Special thanks to our valued alliance sponsors

cta.title: Join SF Dry Cleaning Alliance
cta.description: If you operate a dry cleaning business, join our alliance to enhance service quality and expand your business influence

stores.title: Member Stores
stores.subtitle: Quality dry cleaners across San Francisco districts
stores.search: Search by store name or address...
stores.noResults: No stores found matching your criteria

franchise.title: Join Our Alliance
franchise.subtitle: Become a member of the San Francisco Dry Cleaning Alliance and build a brighter future together

branding.title: Brand Enhancement
branding.description: Join the alliance to elevate your store's brand image and increase customer trust

exposure.title: Online Exposure
exposure.description: Featured on the alliance website for increased online visibility

resources.title: Resource Sharing
resources.description: Exchange experiences and share industry resources with other members

marketing.title: Marketing Support
marketing.description: Unified marketing campaigns to reduce individual store marketing costs

certification.title: Quality Certification
certification.description: Receive alliance quality certification to enhance competitiveness

revenue.title: Increased Revenue
revenue.description: Gain more customers through alliance referrals and boost sales

requirements.title: Membership Requirements
requirements.license: Valid business license and legally operating dry cleaning store in San Francisco
requirements.experience: At least 1 year of business experience with good service reputation
requirements.equipment: Professional dry cleaning equipment and expertise to ensure service quality
requirements.agreement: Align with the alliance's service standards and business philosophy
requirements.participation: Willingness to actively participate in alliance activities and maintain alliance image

form.title: Membership Application
form.subtitle: Please fill out the information below and we'll contact you soon
form.messagePlaceholder: Please briefly describe your store's features or anything else you'd like us to know...
form.disclaimer: By submitting this application, you agree to let us use your information to contact you

success.title: Application Submitted Successfully!
success.message: Thank you for your interest in the San Francisco Dry Cleaning Alliance. Our team will contact you within 3 business days.

hero.title: Unincore
hero.description: Committed to becoming the world's leading direct sales company based on innovative products and subscription platform

about.title: About Us
about.description: UNI&CORE was established in Seoul, South Korea, as a direct sales company focused on beauty and health products. We provide market-leading product lines through a subscription service model and continuously develop innovative products.
